title: Challenger Ahri's Dance
body:
So, as some may know, Challenger Ahri's Dance doesnt have any sound at all.

it did have an sound before, it was the typical sound that was used in the Original Ahri skin.

But after some time now, there is no sound at all while STRG+3 (Dancing) with Challenger Ahri..

Rito pls fix!

{{champion:103}}
